notes.title: Competing interests
notes.p: Patent applications of monoglycosylated influenza vaccines have been submitted by Academia Sinica with C.M., J.R.C. and Y.C.T. as inventors. RuenHuei Biopharmaceuticals, Inc. is in co-development with OPKO Health, Inc. on the monoglycosylated influenza vaccine technology licensed by Academia Sinica.
